text: I kogato priekhme vashiya obet, i vŭzdignakhme nad vas Planinata [vi rekokhme]: “Khvanete zdravo tova, koeto vi dadokhme, i poslushaĭte!” Rekokha: “Chukhme i se vŭzprotivikhme.” I v tyakhnoto neverie sŭrtsata im byakha propiti s teletsa. Kazhi: “Kolko losho e onova, koeto vashata vyara vi povelyava, ako ste vyarvashti!”
